target_markets.market_description: Scientists and researchers working in primary research who need to translate discoveries into market applications
pain_points: isolated research work with no immediate impact
difficulty connecting scientific discoveries to market applications
20+ year timelines for research to become useful
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Department of Energy labs, Silicon Valley tech ecosystem

problems_validated.problem: Scientists focus on research problems but struggle to see non-linear market applications of their discoveries
problems_validated.severity: High - prevents transformative technologies from reaching market
problems_validated.market_gap: Missing connection between scientific discoveries and novel business concepts that can transform markets

products_tools.name: Beam Dream
products_tools.use_case: Functional sleep product to improve sleep quality and performance
products_tools.metrics: 98% of surveyed users fall asleep faster, 99% experience better sleep quality

business_strategies.strategy: Foundry model that connects science, markets, and people to solve big problems
business_strategies.implementation: Identify big problems, find confluence of technologies to solve them, build businesses around solutions
business_strategies.expected_results: Create transformative businesses by seeing non-linear applications of scientific discoveries
business_strategies.case_study: Production Board foundry model spinning up climate tech and other transformative science companies

business_strategies.strategy: Focus on non-linear applications of technology rather than obvious linear paths
business_strategies.implementation: Connect dots between emerging science discoveries and market needs that aren't immediately obvious
business_strategies.expected_results: Create most value by seeing a few steps ahead of where confluence arises
business_strategies.case_study: Optical scanning technology eventually leading to DNA sequencing - not an obvious linear progression

problems_solutions.problem: Scientists work in isolation on research with unclear market impact
problems_solutions.solution: Create foundry model that connects scientific discoveries with market applications and execution talent
steps: Find best available technologies and techniques

startup_ideas.problem_solved: Traditional beverage manufacturing and distribution limitations
startup_ideas.business_model: Climate tech solution for beverage production

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Following linear path from scientific discovery to obvious application
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Miss the most transformative and valuable applications of technology
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Look for non-linear applications and confluence of multiple technologies
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Optical scanning leading to DNA sequencing was not an obvious linear progression

metrics_kpis.benchmark: 98% fall asleep faster, 99% better sleep quality
metrics_kpis.tracking_method: Surveys and Oura ring data tracking
metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Track with wearable devices to see measurable impact

trends_signals.trend: Foundry model for transformative science companies
trends_signals.opportunity: Alternative to traditional VC funding for deep tech and climate solutions

trends_signals.trend: Non-linear technology applications creating most value
trends_signals.opportunity: Look beyond obvious applications of emerging technologies

actionable_quotes.quote: Our job is to connect the dots connect the dots between science markets and people
actionable_quotes.context: Describing the Production Board foundry model approach
actionable_quotes.actionability: Focus on being the connector between different domains rather than expert in just one

actionable_quotes.quote: The most value can be created by seeing maybe a few steps ahead of where the confluence or the non-linearity arises
actionable_quotes.context: Explaining how to find transformative business opportunities
actionable_quotes.actionability: Look for non-obvious connections between emerging technologies and market needs

key_statistics.statistic: 98% of people surveyed fall asleep faster when taking Beam Dream
key_statistics.context: Product efficacy for sleep improvement supplement

key_statistics.statistic: 99% of people experience better sleep quality with Beam Dream
